member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle
member.summary: Specifies the docking style of the page template.
member.remarks: This enumeration is used in class.

example.code: 'Create a PDF document Dim doc As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() 'Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = doc.Pages.Add() Dim rect As RectangleF = New RectangleF(0, 0, page.GetClientSize().Width, page.GetClientSize().Height) 'Create a page template Dim footer As PdfPageTemplateElement = New PdfPageTemplateElement(rect) footer.Dock = PdfDockStyle.Right 'Set the template alignment as top right footer.Alignment = PdfAlignmentStyle.TopRight Dim font As PdfFont = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.Helvetica, 8) Dim brush As PdfSolidBrush = New PdfSolidBrush(Color.Gray) 'Create page number field Dim pageNumber As PdfPageNumberField = New PdfPageNumberField(font, brush) 'Create page count field Dim count As PdfPageCountField = New PdfPageCountField(font, brush) Dim compositeField As PdfCompositeField = New PdfCompositeField(font, brush, "Page {0} of {1}", pageNumber, count) compositeField.Bounds = footer.Bounds compositeField.Draw(footer.Graphics, New PointF(40, footer.Height - 50)) 'Add the footer template at the bottom doc.Template.Right = footer doc.Save("Template.pdf")

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle.None
member.summary: The page template is not docked.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle.Bottom
member.summary: The page template edge is docked to the bottom page's side.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle.Top
member.summary: The page template edge is docked to the top page's side.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle.Left
member.summary: The page template edge is docked to the left page's side.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle.Right
member.summary: The page template edge is docked to the right page's side.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfDockStyle.Fill
member.summary: The page template stretch on full page.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfAlignmentStyle
member.summary: Specifies how the page template is aligned relative to the template area.

example.code: 'Create a PDF document Dim doc As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() 'Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = doc.Pages.Add() Dim rect As RectangleF = New RectangleF(0, 0, page.GetClientSize().Width, page.GetClientSize().Height) 'Create a page template Dim footer As PdfPageTemplateElement = New PdfPageTemplateElement(rect) 'Set the template alignment as top right footer.Alignment = PdfAlignmentStyle.TopRight Dim font As PdfFont = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.Helvetica, 8) Dim brush As PdfSolidBrush = New PdfSolidBrush(Color.Gray) 'Create page number field Dim pageNumber As PdfPageNumberField = New PdfPageNumberField(font, brush) 'Create page count field Dim count As PdfPageCountField = New PdfPageCountField(font, brush) Dim compositeField As PdfCompositeField = New PdfCompositeField(font, brush, "Page {0} of {1}", pageNumber, count) compositeField.Bounds = footer.Bounds compositeField.Draw(footer.Graphics, New PointF(40, footer.Height - 50)) 'Add the footer template at the bottom doc.Template.Bottom = footer doc.Save("Template.pdf")

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle
member.summary: Enumeration of possible transition styles when moving to the page from another during a presentation

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Split
member.summary: Two lines sweep across the screen, revealing the new page. The lines may be either horizontal or vertical and may move inward from the edges of the page or outward from the center.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Blinds
member.summary: Multiple lines, evenly spaced across the screen, synchronously sweep in the same direction to reveal the new page. The lines may be either horizontal or vertical. Horizontal lines move downward; vertical lines move to the right.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Box
member.summary: A rectangular box sweeps inward from the edges of the page or outward from the center, revealing the new page.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Wipe
member.summary: A single line sweeps across the screen from one edge to the other, revealing the new page.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Dissolve
member.summary: The old page dissolves gradually to reveal the new one.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Glitter
member.summary: Similar to Dissolve, except that the effect sweeps across the page in a wide band moving from one side of the screen to the other.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Replace
member.summary: The new page simply replaces the old one with no special transition effect.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Fly
member.summary: Changes are flown out or in, to or from a location that is offscreen.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Push
member.summary: The old page slides off the screen while the new page slides in, pushing the old page out.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Cover
member.summary: The new page slides on to the screen, covering the old page.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Uncover
member.summary: The old page slides off the screen, uncovering the new page.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionStyle.Fade
member.summary: The new page gradually becomes visible through the old one.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionDimension
member.summary: Enumeration of transition dimensions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionDimension.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal effect.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionDimension.Vertical
member.summary: Vertical effect.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionMotion
member.summary: Enumeration of transition motions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionMotion.Inward
member.summary: Inward motion from the edges of the page to center..

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionMotion.Outward
member.summary: Outward motion from the center of the page to edges.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.PdfTransitionDirection
member.summary: Enumeration of transition directions.

member.summary: Left to Right direction.

member.summary: Bottom to Top direction.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedAnnotationCollection
member.summary: Represents the loaded annotation colllection.

example.code: 'Load an existing pdf document. Dim document As New PdfLoadedDocument("..\..\Annotations.pdf") 'Gets the annotation collection. Dim annotationCollection As PdfLoadedAnnotationCollection = document.Pages[1].Annotations 'Gets the pdf sound annotation. Dim soundAnnotation As PdfLoadedSoundAnnotation = dannotationCollection.Annotations(5) as PdfLoadedSoundAnnotation 'Sets the sound annotation border. soundAnnotation.Border.Width = 4 soundAnnotation.Border.HorizontalRadius = 20 soundAnnotation.Border.VerticalRadius = 30 'Set the pdf rubberstamp annotation icon. soundAnnotation.Icon = PdfSoundIcon.Speaker 'Sets the pdf sound. Dim sound As PdfSound = New PdfSound("Startup.wav") soundAnnotation.Sound=sound 'Save the document. document.Save("SoundAnnotation.pdf")

example.code: 'Load an existing document. Dim document As New PdfLoadedDocument("..\..\Annotations.pdf") 'Gets the pfd sound annotation. Dim annotationCollection As PdfLoadedAnnotationCollection = document.Pages[1].Annotations 'Create a new rectangle Dim rectangle As RectangleF = New RectangleF(10, 40, 30, 30) 'Create a new uri Annotation. Dim uriAnnotation As PdfUriAnnotation = New PdfUriAnnotation(rectangle, "http://www.google.com") 'Set the Text to uriAnnotation. uriAnnotation.Text = "Uri Annotation" annotationCollection.Add(uriAnnotation) 'Save the document. document.Save("SoundAnnotation.pdf")

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.Interactive.PdfLoadedStyledAnnotation
member.summary: Represents the PdfLoadedStyledAnnotation.

example.code: 'Load an existing document. Dim document As New PdfLoadedDocument("..\..\Annotations.pdf") 'Gets the annotation from loaded document. Dim fileLinkAnnotation As PdfLoadedFileLinkAnnotation = document.Pages(1).Annotations(6) as PdfLoadedFileLinkAnnotation 'Sets the annotation flags attchmentAnnotation.AnnotationFlags=PdfAnnotationFlags.Default 'Sets the file name. fileLinkAnnotation.FileName = @"..\..\Data\Manual.txt" ' Set the file link annotation border. fileLinkAnnotation.Border=New PdfAnnotationBorder(4, 0, 0) 'Set the file link annotation color. fileLinkAnnotation.Color=New PdfColor(Color.Blue) 'Sets the file link annotation text. fileLinkAnnotation.Text = "File Link Annotation" 'Save the document. document.Save("fileLinkAnnotation.pdf")

example.code: 'Load an existing document Dim ldoc As PdfLoadedDocument = New PdfLoadedDocument("SourceDoc.pdf") ' Load the existing form Dim form As PdfLoadedForm = ldoc.Form ' Load an existing button field. Dim buttonField As PdfLoadedButtonField = TryCast(form.Fields("Submit"), PdfLoadedButtonField) ' Adding print action buttonField.AddPrintAction() ' Save the document to a disk ldoc.Save("Form.pdf")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The byte array with the file content.

example.code: Dim file2 As Stream = New FileStream("sample.pdf", FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read) ' Create a byte array of file stream length Dim pdfData() As Byte = New Byte(file2.Length){} 'Read block of bytes From stream Into the Byte array file2.Read(pdfData,0,System.Convert.ToInt32(pdfData.Length)) ' Load the byte array Dim doc As PdfLoadedDocument = New PdfLoadedDocument(pdfData) doc.Save("Samplepdf.pdf")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The byte array with the file content.
member.remarks: This constructor loads the document and also repairs the wrong offsets. The repairing engine is not capable of fixing all kinds of corruption and the process may delay the loading time depending on the type of issue.

example.code: Dim file2 As Stream = New FileStream("sample.pdf", FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read) ' Create a byte array of file stream length Dim pdfData() As Byte = New Byte(file2.Length){} 'Read block of bytes From stream Into the Byte array file2.Read(pdfData,0,System.Convert.ToInt32(pdfData.Length)) ' Load the byte array Dim doc As PdfLoadedDocument = New PdfLoadedDocument(pdfData,true) doc.Save("Samplepdf.pdf")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The byte array with the file content.
The password (user or owner) of the encrypted document.

example.code: ' Load the byte array with password PdfLoadedDocument doc = new PdfLoadedDocument(pdfData, "password") doc.Save("Samplepdf.pdf")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The byte array with the file content.
The password (user or owner) of the encrypted document.
member.remarks: This constructor loads the document and also repairs the wrong offsets. The repairing engine is not capable of fixing all kinds of corruption and the process may delay the loading time depending on the type of issue.

example.code: ' Load the byte array with password PdfLoadedDocument doc = new PdfLoadedDocument(pdfData, "password",true) doc.Save("Samplepdf.pdf")

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

example.code: 'Load an existing document Dim doc As PdfLoadedDocument = New PdfLoadedDocument("SourceDoc.pdf") 'Create a page Dim page As PdfPageBase = doc.Pages.Add() 'Create Pdf graphics for the page Dim g As PdfGraphics = page.Graphics 'Create a solid brush Dim brush As PdfBrush = New PdfSolidBrush(Color.Black) Dim fontSize As Single = 8f 'Set the font Dim font As PdfFont = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, fontSize) 'Draw the text g.DrawString("HelloWorld", font, brush, New RectangleF(47.835f, 236.835f, 564.165f, 553.937f)) doc.Save("Dispose.pdf") ' Dispose the object doc.Dispose()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Parsing.PdfLoadedDocument.Dispose(System.Boolean)

member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.Security.PdfSecurity
member.summary: Represents the security settings of the PDF document.

example.code: ' Creates a new document Dim document As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() ' Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = document.Pages.Add() Dim graphics As PdfGraphics = page.Graphics Dim font As PdfStandardFont = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 20f, PdfFontStyle.Bold) Dim brush As PdfBrush = PdfBrushes.Black 'Document security Dim security As PdfSecurity = document.Security 'use 128 bits key security.KeySize = PdfEncryptionKeySize.Key128Bit security.OwnerPassword = "syncfusion" security.Permissions = PdfPermissionsFlags.Print Or PdfPermissionsFlags.FullQualityPrint security.UserPassword = "password" document.Save("Security.pdf")

member.summary: Enumeration of signature flags.

member.summary: No flags specified.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.Security.SignatureFlags.SignaturesExists
member.summary: If set, the document contains at least one signature field. This flag allows a viewer application to enable user interface items (such as menu items or pushbuttons) related to signature processing without having to scan the entire document for the presence of signature fields.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Pdf.Security.SignatureFlags.AppendOnly
member.summary: If set, the document contains signatures that may be invalidated if the file is saved (written) in a way that alters its previous contents, as opposed to an incremental update. Merely updating the file by appending new information to the end of the previous version is safe. Viewer applications can use this flag to present a user requesting a full save with an additional alert box warning that signatures will be invalidated and requiring explicit confirmation before continuing with the operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Add(Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItem)
member.summary: Adds the specified item.

example.code: ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection() ' Creates an item Dim item As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Backoffice") item.TextIndent = 10 item.Font = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 12) ' Creates Grid list item Dim gridItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Grid") gridItem.Brush = PdfBrushes.BlueViolet gridItem.Font = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 12) ' Adding items in collection listItemCollection.Add(item) listItemCollection.Add(gridItem)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Add(Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItem,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds the specified item.

example.code: ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection() ' Creates an item Dim item As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Backoffice") item.TextIndent = 10 item.Font = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 12) ' Creates Grid list item Dim gridItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Grid") gridItem.Brush = PdfBrushes.BlueViolet gridItem.Font = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 12) ' Adding items in collection listItemCollection.Add(item) listItemCollection.Add(gridItem)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the item with a specified text.

example.code: ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection() ' Creates an item Dim item As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Backoffice") item.TextIndent = 10 item.Font = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 12) ' Creates Grid list item Dim gridItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Grid") gridItem.Brush = PdfBrushes.BlueViolet gridItem.Font = New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 12) ' Adding items in collection listItemCollection.Add(item, 10) listItemCollection.Add(gridItem, 8)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Add(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds the specified text.

example.code: ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection() ' Adding items in collection listItemCollection.Add("Backoffice", 10) listItemCollection.Add("Grid", 8)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Add(System.String,Syncfusion.Pdf.Graphics.PdfFont)
member.summary: Adds the specified text.

example.code: ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection() ' Adding items in collection listItemCollection.Add("Backoffice", New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman,10)) listItemCollection.Add("Grid", New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 11))

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Add(System.String,Syncfusion.Pdf.Graphics.PdfFont,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds the specified text.

example.code: ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection() ' Adding items in collection listItemCollection.Add("Backoffice", New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman,10), 10) listItemCollection.Add("Grid", New PdfStandardFont(PdfFontFamily.TimesRoman, 11), 8)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItem)
member.summary: Inserts item at the specified index.

example.code: Dim products() As String = { "Tools", "Grid", "Chart", "Edit", "Diagram", "XlsIO", "Grouping", "Calculate", "PDF", "HTMLUI", "DocIO" } ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection(products) Dim newItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("PDF") ' Insert a new item in the collection listItemCollection.Insert(0, newItem)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItem,System.Single)
member.summary: Inserts the specified index.

example.code: Dim products() As String = { "Tools", "Grid", "Chart", "Edit", "Diagram", "XlsIO", "Grouping", "Calculate", "PDF", "HTMLUI", "DocIO" } ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection(products) Dim newItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("PDF") ' Insert a new item in the collection listItemCollection.Insert(0, newItem, 10)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Remove(Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItem)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from the list.

example.code: Dim products() As String = { "Tools", "Grid", "Chart", "Edit", "Diagram", "XlsIO", "Grouping", "Calculate", "PDF", "HTMLUI", "DocIO" } ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection(products) Dim toolsItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Tools") ' Remove 'Tools' list item listItemCollection.Remove(toolsItem)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the item at the specified index from the list.

example.code: Dim products() As String = { "Tools", "Grid", "Chart", "Edit", "Diagram", "XlsIO", "Grouping", "Calculate", "PDF", "HTMLUI", "DocIO" } ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection(products) ' Remove the firse item from the collection listItemCollection.RemoveAt(0)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.IndexOf(Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItem)
member.summary: Determines the index of a specific item in the list.
member.param: The item to locate in the list.
member.returns: The index of item if found in the list; otherwise, -1.

example.code: Dim products() As String = { "Tools", "Grid", "Chart", "Edit", "Diagram", "XlsIO", "Grouping", "Calculate", "PDF", "HTMLUI", "DocIO" } ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection(products) ' Creates 'Tools' list item Dim toolsItem As PdfListItem = New PdfListItem("Tools") Dim indexOf As Integer = listItemCollection.IndexOf(toolsItem)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Pdf.Lists.PdfListItemCollection.Clear
member.summary: Clears collection.

example.code: Dim products() As String = { "Tools", "Grid", "Chart", "Edit", "Diagram", "XlsIO", "Grouping", "Calculate", "PDF", "HTMLUI", "DocIO" } ' Creates an item collection Dim listItemCollection As PdfListItemCollection = New PdfListItemCollection(products) ' Clears the list listItemCollection.Clear()

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Pdf.Tables.PdfColumn
member.summary: Represents a single column of the table.

example.code: ' Creates a PDF document Dim doc As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() ' Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = doc.Pages.Add() Dim table As PdfLightTable = New PdfLightTable() ' Set the DataSourceType as Direct table.DataSourceType = PdfLightTableDataSourceType.TableDirect ' Gets the columns collection Dim tableColumns As PdfColumnCollection = table.Columns ' Creating Columns tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Roll Number")) tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Name")) tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Class")) ' Adding Rows table.Rows.Add(New Object() { "111", "Maxim", "III" }) ' Draws the table table.Draw(page, New PointF(0, 0)) doc.Save("Tables.pdf")

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Pdf.Tables.PdfColumn.StringFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the string format.

example.code: ' Creates a PDF document Dim doc As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() ' Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = doc.Pages.Add() Dim table As PdfLightTable = New PdfLightTable() ' Set the DataSourceType as Direct table.DataSourceType = PdfLightTableDataSourceType.TableDirect ' Gets the columns collection Dim tableColumns As PdfColumnCollection = table.Columns ' Creates a new column Dim rollNumber As PdfColumn = New PdfColumn("Roll Number") 'Set the string format rollNumber.StringFormat = New PdfStringFormat(PdfTextAlignment.Left) tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Name")) tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Class")) ' Adding Rows table.Rows.Add(New Object() { "111", "Maxim", "III" }) ' Draws the table table.Draw(page, New PointF(0, 0)) doc.Save("Tables.pdf")

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Pdf.Tables.PdfColumn.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the column.

example.code: ' Creates a PDF document Dim doc As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() ' Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = doc.Pages.Add() Dim table As PdfLightTable = New PdfLightTable() ' Set the DataSourceType as Direct table.DataSourceType = PdfLightTableDataSourceType.TableDirect ' Gets the columns collection Dim tableColumns As PdfColumnCollection = table.Columns ' Creates a new column Dim rollNumber As PdfColumn = New PdfColumn("Roll Number") 'Set the string format rollNumber.Width = 20f tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Name")) tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Class")) ' Adding Rows table.Rows.Add(New Object() { "111", "Maxim", "III" }) ' Draws the table table.Draw(page, New PointF(0, 0)) doc.Save("Tables.pdf")

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Pdf.Tables.PdfColumn.ColumnName
member.summary: Gets or sets the column name.

example.code: ' Creates a PDF document Dim doc As PdfDocument = New PdfDocument() ' Create a page Dim page As PdfPage = doc.Pages.Add() Dim table As PdfLightTable = New PdfLightTable() ' Set the DataSourceType as Direct table.DataSourceType = PdfLightTableDataSourceType.TableDirect ' Gets the columns collection Dim tableColumns As PdfColumnCollection = table.Columns ' Creates a new column Dim rollNumber As PdfColumn = New PdfColumn("Roll Number") 'Set the string format rollNumber.ColumnName = "Roll Number" tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Name")) tableColumns.Add(New PdfColumn("Class")) ' Adding Rows table.Rows.Add(New Object() { "111", "Maxim", "III" }) ' Draws the table table.Draw(page, New PointF(0, 0)) doc.Save("Tables.pdf")
